title.narrative: Improvement of the Wellbeing of Rural Families in Andriivka Village, Pokrovskyi Raion, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast

description.narrative: The Improvement of the Wellbeing of Rural Families in Andriivka Village, Pokrovskyi Raion, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast Project will target at least 225 rural families by providing livestock, equipment, services and training. As a result of the project, 10 rural families will receive heifers, 15 families will receive gilts and one boar, and 20 families will receive 20 ewes and one ram. Additionally, 80 families will receive animals through Heifer’s Pass on the Gift model. Later, the entire community will “pass back” to the agricultural services cooperative (ASC). A further 100 families will benefit from the project through their participation in the project training program and use of cooperative services (using equipment co-financed by the Increasing the Competitiveness of the Dairy Sector in Ukraine Project, Danone and Heifer Ukraine). The Dobrobut Andriivky ASC will receive one milk-cooling tank, a digital milk analyzer and individual milking machines to enable the ASC to render services in collected and selling milk. The project participants will improve their welfare through improved milk quality and scaling up the milk production process. Additionally, the ASC will receive equipment for an artificial insemination center, veterinary medicines for animal treatment and materials for pasture improvement.
